item.title: ABB评估特朗普命令对多样性、公平性和包容性的影响
item.description: ABB 工程公司周四表示，正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的行政命令对多元化、公平和包容政策的影响，尽管该公司并未对其运营做出任何改变。【原文：ABB is evaluating the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's executive orders on diversity, equity and inclusion policies, the engineering company said on Thursday, although it has made no changes to its operations.】

item.title: 德国慕尼黑再保险公司将斥资 26 亿美元收购 Next 保险公司
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险公司（Munich Re）的一个部门周四表示，该公司将收购其尚未拥有的 Next Insurance 71% 的股份，以加强其在美国的立足点，并将这家总部位于加利福尼亚州的公司估值为 26 亿美元。【原文：Munich Re is buying the 71% of Next Insurance that it doesn't already own, strengthening its foothold in the United States and valuing the California-based company at $2.6 billion, a division of the German company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢以成本上升为由剥离德国两家工厂
item.description: 全球最大的包装食品公司雀巢公司周四表示，将剥离德国的两家工厂，理由是成本上升和消费者对价格的敏感性导致产能过剩。【原文：Nestle will divest two factories in Germany, the world's largest packaged food company said on Thursday, citing overcapacity due to rising costs and consumer price sensitivity.】

item.title: 在印度新一轮审查制度斗争中，X 公司就内容删除问题起诉莫迪政府
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司在对新德里提起的新诉讼中称，印度信息技术部非法扩大了审查权力，允许更容易地删除在线内容，并授权 "无数 "政府官员执行此类命令。【原文：India's IT ministry has unlawfully expanded censorship powers to allow the easier removal of online content and empowered "countless" government officials to execute such orders, Elon Musk's X has alleged in a new lawsuit against New Delhi.】

item.title: PREVIEW 耐克因需求停滞而出现五年来最严重的收入下滑
item.description: 由于耐克的新产品未能打开美国人的钱包，他们不愿购买体育用品和服装等非必需品，预计耐克将在本周四发布的季度财报中公布近五年来最大幅度的收入下滑。【原文：Nike is expected to post its steepest revenue decline in nearly five years in its quarterly results on Thursday, as its new products failed to open the wallets of Americans reluctant to snap up non-essential items like sporting goods and clothing.】

item.title: Meta 将在加拿大大选前要求公开使用人工智能的政治广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 将要求广告商披露使用人工智能或其他数字技术制作或更改政治或社会问题广告的情况。【原文：Meta Platforms will ask advertisers to disclose the use of AI or other digital techniques to create or alter a political or social issue ad, the Facebook-owner said on Thursday, aiming to curb misinformation ahead of the Canadian federal elections.】

item.title: 特朗普将于上午 10:40 在加密货币会议上发表讲话
item.description: 白宫周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于上午 10:40（格林尼治标准时间 14:40）在一次加密货币行业会议上发表虚拟讲话。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will deliver virtual remarks at 10:40 a.m. (1440 GMT) at a cryptocurrency industry conference, the White House said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 2 月成屋销售意外增长
item.description: 随着供应量的增加将买家拉回市场，2 月份美国现房销售意外增长，但经济不确定性的上升可能会限制销售的进一步增长。【原文：U.S. existing home sales unexpectedly increased in February as rising supply pulled buyers back into the market, but rising economic uncertainty could limit further gains.】

item.title: 即将登陆纽交所的 Klarna 与 DoorDash 签订支付协议
item.description: 正准备在纽约证券交易所上市的瑞典支付公司 Klarna 周四表示，它已与在线食品和杂货配送公司 DoorDash 建立了支付合作关系。【原文：Swedish payments firm Klarna, which is gearing up for a listing on the New York Stock Exchange, said on Thursday it has entered a payments partnership with online food and grocery delivery firm DoorDash .】

item.title: 贝恩资本以 5.08 亿美元收购印度 Manappuram Finance 公司 18% 的股份
item.description: 印度黄金贷款提供商 Manappuram Finance 周四表示，贝恩资本将以 438.5 亿卢比（约合 5.08 亿美元）的价格收购该公司 18% 的股份。【原文：Indian gold loan provider Manappuram Finance on Thursday said Bain Capital would buy an 18% stake in the company for 43.85 billion rupees ($508 million)】

item.title: 美国第四季度经常账户赤字收窄
item.description: 美国经常账户赤字在第四季度有所收缩，但这种改善可能是暂时的，因为在企业为规避关税而抢先购买外国商品的推动下，商品进口在一月份飙升至历史新高。【原文：The U.S. current account deficit contracted in the fourth quarter, but the improvement could be temporary as goods imports surged to a record high in January, driven by businesses preemptively buying foreign merchandise to avoid tariffs.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格下跌 3%，原因是预测需求下降，且将发布储气报告
item.description: 美国天然气期货周四下跌约 3%，原因是据预测，下周天气将比之前预期的温和，需求将比之前预期的少，这将使未来几周公用事业公司需要从储气库中提取的天然气量保持在较低水平。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures fell about 3% on Thursday on forecasts for milder weather and less demand next week than previously expected, which should keep the amount of gas utilities need to pull from storage low in coming weeks.】

item.title: 花旗银行将未来 3 个月黄金价格目标上调至每盎司 3,200 美元
item.description: 花旗研究公司周四将未来三个月的黄金价格目标从每盎司3000美元上调至3200美元，理由是官方部门需求强劲，交易所交易基金需求增加。【原文：Citi Research on Thursday raised its gold price target for the next three months to $3,200 per ounce from $3,000, citing robust official sector demand and higher exchange-traded-fund demand.】

item.title: 亚马逊将向供应商和客户出售碳信用额度
item.description: 这家美国零售巨头表示，亚马逊已开始向其供应商、商业客户和其他公司出售碳信用额度，这些信用额度可用于抵消其破坏气候的碳排放。【原文：Amazon has begun selling carbon credits to its suppliers, business customers and other companies, the U.S. retail giant said, which can be used to offset their climate-damaging carbon emissions.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，苹果每年在流媒体服务上的损失超过 10 亿美元
item.description: The Information 周四援引两位知情人士的话报道称，苹果公司在流媒体服务 Apple TV+ 上的年亏损额超过了 10 亿美元。【原文：Apple is losing more than $1 billion a year on its streaming service Apple TV+, the Information reported on Thursday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉德国工厂的工会请愿书要求延长休息时间、增加员工数量以满足 Model Y 量产的需要
item.description: 特斯拉德国工厂约有 3000 名工人在工会请愿书上签名，要求延长休息时间和增加人手，尽管该公司表示大多数工人对自己的工作感到满意，这表明工会与这家美国电动汽车制造商之间的纷争仍在继续。【原文：Around 3,000 workers at Tesla's German plant signed a union petition for longer breaks and more staff, even as the company said most workers were satisfied with their jobs, in a sign of ongoing strife between unions and the U.S. EV maker.】

item.title: 面对不确定性，英国央行试图抑制快速降息的言论
item.description: 英国央行将利率维持在 4.5%，并警告不要假设在接下来的几次会议上将会降息，因为英国和世界经济都面临着严重的不确定性。【原文：The Bank of England held interest rates at 4.5% and warned against assumptions that they would be cut over its next few meetings as it grappled with deep uncertainty hanging over the British and world economies.】

item.title: 亚马逊和 Flipkart 在仓库突击检查中被发现违反印度质量控制规则
item.description: 印度政府最高产品认证机构周四表示，零售巨头亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下的 Flipkart 违反了印度的质量控制规定，储存了没有所需标准证书的产品。【原文：Retail giants Amazon and Walmart-owned Flipkart violated Indian quality control rules by stocking products that did not have the required standards certificate, India's top government-run product certification agency said on Thursday.】

item.title: 各国央行对降息更加谨慎
item.description: 在一系列降息措施之后，随着全球经济和政治不确定性的增加，大型发达市场央行开始变得谨慎。【原文：Big developed market central banks are turning cautious after a series of interest rate cuts and as uncertainty in global economics and politics grows.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数小幅上升，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，表明 3 月份劳动力市场保持稳定，但在贸易紧张局势加剧和政府大幅削减开支的情况下，劳动力市场的前景正变得暗淡。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased slightly last week, suggesting the labor market remained stable in March, though the outlook is darkening amid rising trade tensions and deep cuts in government spending.】

item.title: 押宝设计师洗牌的奢侈时尚面临艰难前路
item.description: 奢侈时尚的不景气促使顶级品牌古驰（Gucci）、香奈儿（Chanel）和迪奥（Dior）对设计师进行重组，以重新点燃品牌热度，同时避免过于激进的重新设置，以免让富裕的购物者感到困惑。【原文：A slump in luxury fashion is prompting designer reshuffles at top houses Gucci, Chanel and Dior to reignite heat around their brands - while avoiding too radical a reset that could confuse affluent shoppers.】

item.title: 捷普上调 2025 年利润和收入预期，以满足数据中心需求
item.description: 在数据中心基础设施需求强劲的帮助下，电子元件制造商捷普周四上调了 2025 年利润和收入预期，第二季度业绩超出华尔街预期。【原文：Electronic component maker Jabil on Thursday raised its 2025 profit and revenue forecast, after beating Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results, helped by strong demand for data center infrastructure.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩：欧洲对美国支付公司的依赖使其容易受到胁迫
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）周四表示，欧洲对美国支付服务提供商的依赖使其容易受到经济胁迫，削弱了其自主性，并强化了数字欧元的地位。【原文：Europe's dependence on U.S.-based payment providers leaves it open to economic coercion, weakening its autonomy and strengthening the case for a digital euro, ECB chief economist Philip Lane said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟卫生监管机构批准在脂肪肝试验中使用人工智能工具
item.description: 欧洲药品管理局委员会周四同意在临床试验中使用一种名为 AIM-NASH 的人工智能（AI）工具来帮助识别一种脂肪肝的严重程度。【原文：A European Medicines Agency committee, on Thursday, accepted the use of an artificial intelligence (AI) tool called AIM-NASH in clinical trials to help identify the severity of a type of fatty liver disease.】

item.title: 主要券商认为美联储降息步伐放缓，尽管特朗普关税存在不确定性
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会周三维持其基准利率不变后，主要经纪商维持了他们对美国联邦储备委员会放慢降息步伐的预测。【原文：Major brokerages maintained their predictions for a slower pace of interest-rate cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve after the central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国央行维持利率不变，警告在不确定性面前不要臆测降息
item.description: 英国伦敦，3 月 20 日（路透社）--英国央行将利率维持在 4.5%，并警告不要假设在未来几次会议上将会降息，因为英国央行正在努力应对笼罩在英国和世界经济上空的严重不确定性。【原文：LONDON, March 20 (Reuters) - The Bank of England held interest rates at 4.5% and warned against assumptions that they would be cut over its next few meetings as it grappled with deep uncertainty hanging over the British and world economies.】

item.title: NatWest 与 OpenAI 签订具有里程碑意义的英国银行业合作协议
item.description: NatWest 和 OpenAI 已联手利用人工智能增强贷款机构的数字助理和客户支持流程，这是英国总部银行首次开展此类合作。【原文：NatWest and OpenAI have joined forces to enhance the lender's digital assistants and customer support processes using artificial intelligence, in the first collaboration of its kind with a UK-headquartered bank.】

item.title: 美国是否正在走向衰退？
item.description: 本文最初发表于《On The Money》时事通讯，我们每隔一周在此分享美国个人理财技巧和见解。在此注册，即可免费接收。【原文：This was originally published in the On The Money newsletter, where we share U.S. personal finance tips and insights every other week. Sign up hereto receive it for free.】

item.title: 英伟达支持的 CoreWeave 计划在美国首次公开募股中融资 27 亿美元
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）支持的CoreWeave公司周四提交的一份监管文件显示，该人工智能初创公司计划在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达27亿美元的资金。【原文：Nvidia-backed CoreWeave is aiming to raise as much as $2.7 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, a regulatory filing by the AI startup showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 西班牙首相桑切斯认为国防技术升级是欧盟的当务之急
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）周四在布鲁塞尔表示，欧盟应将重点放在加强自卫的技术能力上，而不是建立更多的武器储备。【原文：Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said on Thursday in Brussels that the European Union should focus on bolstering its technological capabilities to defend itself rather than building more stocks of weapons.】
